actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that the future of Taiwan should be resolved peacefully, through a democratic mechanism, with the express consent of the people of Taiwan and free from outside threats, intimidation, or interference.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the future of Taiwan: (1) should be resolved peacefully, through a democratic mechanism, and with the consent of the people of Taiwan; and (2) must be decided by the people of Taiwan without outside threats, intimidation, or interference.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that the future of Taiwan should be resolved peacefully, through a democratic mechanism, with the express consent of the people of Taiwan and free from outside threats, intimidation, or interference.
